description: /a/Extended Drawers are a way to store a larger number of items in 1 place/a/
There are multiple different types of drawers.
There is a 1x1 drawer which stores only 1 item in it at a high ammount.
There is also a 2x1 it will store 2 different items but the total stack size is split between the 2.
The 2x2 drawer can hold the most unique items but the total stack size is slit between the 4 items so will store less of each item
